changeSet.author: abrzozowski
changeSet.sql: -- cinema-city INSERT INTO ROOMS (number, name, BUILDING_ID) SELECT 1, NULL, id FROM BUILDINGS WHERE STREET = 'Ostrobramska' AND NAME = 'Cinema City'; INSERT INTO ROOMS (number, name, BUILDING_ID) SELECT 2, NULL, id FROM BUILDINGS WHERE STREET = 'Ostrobramska' AND NAME = 'Cinema City'; INSERT INTO ROOMS (number, name, BUILDING_ID) SELECT 3, NULL, id FROM BUILDINGS WHERE STREET = 'Ostrobramska' AND NAME = 'Cinema City'; INSERT INTO ROOMS (number, name, BUILDING_ID) SELECT 4, NULL, id FROM BUILDINGS WHERE STREET = 'Ostrobramska' AND NAME = 'Cinema City'; INSERT INTO ROOMS (number, name, BUILDING_ID) SELECT 5, NULL, id FROM BUILDINGS WHERE STREET = 'Ostrobramska' AND NAME = 'Cinema City'; INSERT INTO ROOMS (number, name, BUILDING_ID) SELECT 6, NULL, id FROM BUILDINGS WHERE STREET = 'Ostrobramska' AND NAME = 'Cinema City'; INSERT INTO ROOMS (number, name, BUILDING_ID) SELECT 7, NULL, id FROM BUILDINGS WHERE STREET = 'Ostrobramska' AND NAME = 'Cinema City';
